dcterms:description: Hanabi is a partially-observable cooperative multi-agent benchmark that has been popular for studying Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) in a cooperative setting.
dcterms:title: Hanabi

dcterms:description: Google Football is a novel reinforcement learning environment designed for training agents in a football simulation.
dcterms:title: Google Football

dcterms:description: Starcraft is a multi-agent challenge that provides a platform for evaluating cooperative and competitive strategies in a real-time strategy game.
dcterms:title: Starcraft

dcterms:description: The Multi-Agent Particle Environment (MPE) is designed for testing multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms in mixed cooperative-competitive environments.
dcterms:title: MPE (Multi-Agent Particle Environment)

dcterms:description: Small Hanabi is a variant of the Hanabi game with fewer colors/cards, used for benchmarking.
dcterms:title: Small Hanabi
